description:
In this week's episode of the podcast, freeCodeCamp founder Quincy Larson discusses the lighter side of tech with Cassidy Williams. Cassidy is the CTO at Contenda, a developer experience expert, and a meme-maker.

Follow Cassidy on Twitter: https://twitter.com/cassidoo

Be sure to follow The freeCodeCamp podcast in your favorite podcast app. And share this podcast with a friend. Let's inspire more folks to learn to code and build careers for themselves in tech.
title: Having Fun in Tech with Cassidy Williams – freeCodeCamp Podcast
